pitchPageTourSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Pitch Page

This page contains all the learners and panelists participating in this pitch.
This is the learners' tab. Click here to view the list of learners participating in this pitch.
This is the panelists' tab. Click here to view the list of panelists invited to this pitch.
This section shows a brief report of the learners in this pitch.
This section shows a brief report of the panelists in this pitch.
This is a learner's card. Clicking on it allows you to view the learner's grades if the learner has been graded.
You can tell if the learner has been graded or not from here.
This is a panelist's card. It contains information about the panelist and whether or they have accepted the invite to this pitch.

Welcome to the Pitch Page

This page contains the list of all the learners you have been invited to rate.
This is a learner's profile card. Clicking on it allows you to view the ratings you gave to this learner if the learner has been rated. Otherwise, click on it to rate this learner.
You can tell if you have rated this learner or not from here.
Click on any page number to view and rate more learners in this pitch.

Welcome to the Pitch Page

This page contains the list of all the learners you have been invited to rate.
This is a learner's profile card. Clicking on it allows you to view the ratings you gave to this learner if the learner has been rated. Otherwise, click on it to rate this learner.
You can tell if you have rated this learner or not from here.
Click on any page number to view and rate more learners in this pitch.

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page
